participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and thoughtful, enjoys learning and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.

participant_2.personality: Laid-back and practical, enjoys hands-on work and has a down-to-earth approach to life.
participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i'm an electrician.
